text: No Rainbow in the Sky is a novel by F. J. Thwaites. It was adapted into radio in 1965.No Rainbow in the Sky radio play at AustLit ==Beyond the Rainbow== Beyond the Rainbow is a novel by F. J. Thwaites. It was a sequel to No Rainbow in the Sky. It was adapted for radio in 1966.Beyond the Rainbow radio show at AustLit ==References== ==External links== *No Rainbow in the Sky at AustLit *Beyond the Rainbow at AustLit Category:1959 Australian novels
title: No Rainbow in the Sky
